title: "TrendForce: AWS to give Arm a leg up to 22% datacenter server share by 2025"
excerpt: "The increasing adoption of Arm-compatible chips by cloud service providers is expected to grow the CPU architecture's global share of datacenter server processors to 22 percent by 2025, according to a report by Taiwan-based research firm TrendForce."
